titleStmt.title: Ovid's epistles translated by several hands.
Heroides. English
titleStmt.author: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

notesStmt.note: The preface is by Dryden; the translations are by him, Scrope, Tate and others.
First ed. of this collection. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Princeton University Library.
